actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-26.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1900) to assure the solvency of the Social Security Trust Funds, to reform the medicare reimbursement of hospitals, to extend the Federal supplemental compensation program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1900 (Social Security Act amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1900) to assure the solvency of the Social Security Trust Funds, to reform the medicare reimbursement of hospitals, to extend the Federal supplemental compensation program, and for other purposes.
